result.arabic_text: فَتَلَقَّىٰٓ ءَادَمُ مِن رَّبِّهِۦ كَلِمَٰتٖ فَتَابَ عَلَيۡهِۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلتَّوَّابُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
result.translation: 37.Nabii Aadam isi Rabbik Qangooruy usuk kaa Barseeh kaa yiysixxige beeteeh oggoleeh kaa edde kallaceeh Yalli toobat kaak oggoleh, Diggah usuk isi Naqoosak kaal gace marak toobat oggolaah isi Naqoosah farakka iyya Racmat- le Rabbi kinni.
